name: Wedding Speech Game
description: You're at the wedding of two of your dearest friends, Megan and Jacob. However, they call you up to give a speech during dinner and you're totally unprepared! Improvise your way through a wedding speech in front of all their friends and family, and find out afterward how well you did! Are you still friends, or kicked out before the cake is cut? Only one way to find out.  6 possible rankings.
